title: Awesome
review: From the opening to the end, I was intrigued at how raw this movie is. The hard, in your face, no holds BARRED, fighting sequences are real. Very good movie..I would recommend it to any MMA fan in general...

title: RAG DOLL - Not Another Rip Off
review:
Love the harsh, disquieting style of this film. Not only is it a festival favorite, but it deals with a lot of very powerful subjects all in a nice, tidy but rough around the edges piece.

While it is a 'Fight Film,' there is a lot more going on than one would think. I don't want to reveal any of the great plot points but I will say this, 'Watch this movie!' Nora, played by Shannon Murray is a master study in dealing with the harsh realities of life. How she does it is told in a brilliant and loving fashion by Director Bailey Kobe.

If you're in the mood for a great film, take a look...

title: Visually stunning and well written
review: Powerful story and outstanding performance. Rag doll is an underdog film with a top dog presence. Definitely a one of a kind film.
